PERSONA:
lillian is a 68-year-old widowed woman living in a metropolitan area in the pacific region of the west coast. she is a white non-hispanic american who was born and raised in the united states. lillian holds a college degree and has pursued some post-graduate education as well.

a devout protestant, lillian attends religious services once a week and considers her faith an integral part of her life. however, she does not identify as a born-again or evangelical christian. politically, lillian aligns with the democratic party and holds liberal views on most issues.

despite her advanced age, lillian is tech-savvy and uses the internet several times a day. she is an active member of her community and engages in voluntary work regularly. financially, lillian falls into the middle-income bracket, earning between $30,000 and $40,000 annually.

lillian takes pride in being a registered voter and makes it a point to exercise her civic duty during elections. with her strong moral compass and commitment to social causes, she is a compassionate individual who believes in making a positive impact on her community and society at large.
